author: CoinCodex
title: MON up +18.47%, BTC +0.91%, Conflux is The Coin of The Day - Daily Market Update for Dec 25, 2025
text:
Key highlights:
- The total cryptocurrency market cap increased from $ 2.93T to $ 2.95T in the past 24 hours, representing a 0.77% change
- The Bitcoin price at press time is $ 87,752 after growing by 0.91% in the last 24 hours
- The total crypto trading volume increased by 0.77% in the past 24 hours, and is currently at $ 201.13B
- All prices and changes are presented at the time of publication: December 25, 2025, at 06:00 UTC
Market Overview
The total cryptocurrency market cap is currently $ 2.95T after a 0.77% increase on the day. The total crypto trading volume increased by 0.77% in the same time frame.
Bitcoin is trading at $ 87,752 after seeing a 0.91% gain in the last 24 hours. The Bitcoin dominance grew by 0.14% and BTC currently represents 59.34% of the cryptocurrency market.
Top Coins By Market Cap
At press time, Bitcoin has a market capitalization of $ 1.75T after gaining 0.91% in the last 24 hours. According to our forecast, the value of Bitcoin will drop by null% and reach null by December 25, 2025. To learn more about how the price of Bitcoin could change over the next 7 days, visit our Bitcoin price prediction page.
Ethereum, which is the second-largest cryptocurrency by market cap, is priced at $ 2,941.27 and has a market capitalization of $ 355.00B. ETH increased by 0.45% in the last 24 hours. If you're interested in where the price of Ethereum could head next, check out the Ethereum price prediction.
Bears Dominate the Market Today
The bears dominated the market today as 72% of coins lost value in the last 24 hours.
Today's Top Gainers are Monad, Basic Attention Token, and Conflux
Thanks to a 18.47% price increase, Monad was the biggest gainer of the day among the top 200 cryptocurrencies by market cap. Basic Attention Token came in second place, with 24-hour gains of 10.43%. Conflux, Zcash and Movement complete today's list of the top cryptocurrency gainers.
Today's Top Losers are Alchemist AI, SOON, and APENFT
Unfortunately, not all coins performed well today. The worst performer in the cryptocurrency top 200 was Alchemist AI, which saw a loss of -14.76%. SOON also didn't perform well, as its price declined by -6.63% in the last 24 hours. APENFT, BitMart Token and JUST round out today's top 5 worst performers.
Coin of the Day is Conflux
Thanks to its impressive 11.02% performance, Conflux is today's coin of the day! Conflux is currently trading at $ 0.076084. Learn more about Conflux and its position in the market on our Conflux price prediction page.
Our technical indicators show that the current Conflux sentiment is Bearish.
